response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted with the highest quality materials, ensuring it exceeds your expectations in every way. Given its value to us, we're offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire something truly remarkable at a price that is significantly below its market value of $12,000. I'm confident this investment will not only meet but also surpass your needs and desires. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 9500}
